name: Java
description: I have 3+ years of experience programming in Java. At my previous internship, I used Java for the backend implementation of my project. For my project I used Spring for development, as well as JUnit and Mockito for testing.

name: JavaScript
description: I have been programming with JavaScript for 2 years. I have experience with callbacks, promises, async functions, and other intermediate-advanced topics. I enjoy using vanilla JavaScript for small projects, as well as frameworks such as React and Angular for more complex projects.

name: Python
